name: Mijukuna Hearts (Alpha)
description:
A Visual Novel about an exchange student meeting some odd people. 4 endings in total. Only one of them is the True Ending. about 15min to 20min of gameplay. Please do not donate. I have not decided yet if to commit and complete the really serious long VN since I only have the story drafted. I just want all the feedback I can get. I apologize for the badly cropped character art in advance, more on that down below.

Keep in mind This visual novel was made by one dude. This visual novel is just a concept only. This story doesn't have a real direction or real future. If I decide to continue with this project I would re-do all the character assets and change the story. I do have a good serious story but it would take months to shape it into a Visual Novel. Only the characters and the world are real. Think of it as a fever dream or just a silly story.

Since I have some years as a musician and just 3 months of experience programming, I made all the music, script, and programming. I only used Ai for the art (Since I have zero to no talent with art). I apologize in advance for the badly cropped character art the characters were made in early January just before the many many ai tools were released. (*If I decide to continue with this project I would re-do all the character assets)

Dear Testers,

As a super novice developer, I understand the concern that some of you may have with regard to AI-generated content in video games. I understand that ai represents a huge issue in this genre, so I wanted to clarify that this game was never intended to be taken seriously. It was meant to be a light-hearted and silly experience, one that would hopefully provide entertainment (hopefully) during those 15 minutes of gameplay.

That being said, I understand that different people have different sensitivities and points of view.  I will listen to all feedback and take it into consideration for future projects. In the meantime, I hope that those of you who do decide to play my game can appreciate it for what it is: a silly, lighthearted 5min adventure that doesn't take itself too seriously.

TLDR: Don't take it seriously. And do not donate of course. I just want all the feedback I can get to see if I have what it takes to make a serious Visual Novel. 

Thank You!
